long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TripAdvisor® Review Scraper is a powerful browser extension that allows users to scrape and export reviews from various sections of TripAdvisor. With the ability to export data to convenient CSV, JSON, or XLSX (Excel) files, users can easily analyze and utilize the data for their needs.

New AI-Powered Features
Our latest version has integrated advanced AI capabilities to enhance your experience. Our AI can analyze and summarize user reviews, helping you make more informed decisions when choosing products or services. This feature saves you time and provides valuable insights at a glance.

No need to read through numerous reviews yourself - the ChatGPT does the heavy lifting by quickly distilling the key points to inform your decisions. Whether researching products, services, hotels or more, let the GPT assistant efficiently extract the essence of customer feedback for you, saving valuable time.

What Types of Reviews Can Be Scraped?
You can scrape reviews for:
- Hotels
- Attractions
- Cruises
- Things to Do
- Restaurants
- Airlines
- Vacation Rentals

## What Information Does It Scrape?
The extension captures the following details:
- Display Name
- User Name
- User Profile
- Rating
- Review Title
- Review
- Date

How to Extract Reviews?
Scraping reviews is simple and requires no coding skills. Just follow these steps:
1. Open TripAdvisor.com and navigate to the hotel, attraction, restaurant, airline, or vacation rental from which you want to extract reviews.
2. Click the "Download Reviews" button beside the review number.
3. Wait for the process to complete, and then click "Download Reviews" on the popup window to save the data in CSV, JSON, or XLSX (Excel) format.
4. If you need AI analyze and summarize user reviews. Click the "AI Review Summary" button below for a detailed analysis.

How Quickly Will I Receive the Results?
The data extraction process starts immediately after you make a request. The duration depends on the volume of information you need to retrieve.

Data Privacy
Your customer data is 100% secure, as it never leaves your local machine. We prioritize user privacy by eliminating any user data transmission to our servers.

Disclaimer
This extension is an independently developed product by ExtensionsBox and has no association with TripAdvisor, Inc.
